Zombi Crusade 2016 is a gamer into many new game modes, more attractive than those of other famous players. With this new game modes in the game Zombie Crusade, players must have a more rational thinking, sharper tactics to build the best system for their defense.
Zombi Crusade has the following features: Play in offline mode without intenet or 3G. Sharp picture graphics, spectacular effects attract players. Background music, lively sound. There are many tasks in the current playing level 12.
